trans-unit.source: Wraps an XSD <xref uid="langword_csharp_gYearMonth" name="gYearMonth" href=""></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: Encapsula num wrapper um XSD <xref uid="langword_csharp_gYearMonth" name="gYearMonth" href=""> </xref> tipo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about XSD data types, see "XML Data Types Reference" in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações sobre os tipos de dados XSD, consulte "XML dados Types Reference" na biblioteca do MSDN em http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYearMonth"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYearMonth"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYearMonth"></xref> class with a specified <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYearMonth"> </xref> classe com uma determinada <xref:System.DateTime>objeto.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> object to initialize the current instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime>objeto ao inicializar a instância atual.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYearMonth"></xref> class with a specified <xref:System.DateTime> object and an integer that indicates whether <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYearMonth.Value*> is a positive or negative value.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYearMonth"> </xref> classe com uma determinada <xref:System.DateTime>objeto e um número inteiro que indica se <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYearMonth.Value*>é um valor positivo ou negativo.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYearMonth.Value*> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: An integer of less than 0 indicates a negative `sign`.
trans-unit.target: Um número inteiro de inferior a 0 indica negativo `sign`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> object to initialize the current instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime>objeto ao inicializar a instância atual.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates whether `value` is positive.
trans-unit.target: Um número inteiro que indica se `value` for positivo.

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML Schema definition language (XSD) of the current SOAP type.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o idioma de definição de esquema XML (XSD) do tipo SOAP atual.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that indicates the XSD of the current SOAP type.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que indica o XSD do tipo SOAP atual.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <xref:System.String> into a <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYearMonth"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Converte especificado <xref:System.String>para um <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYearMonth"> </xref> objeto.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The Parse method is capable of parsing strings in various formats.
trans-unit.target: O método de análise é capaz de análise cadeias em diferentes formatos.

trans-unit.source: The recognizable string formats are composed out of the following format patterns.
trans-unit.target: Os formatos de cadeia reconhecível são compostos por fora os padrões de formato seguinte.

trans-unit.source: |Format Pattern|Description|Examples| |--------------------|-----------------|--------------| |yyyy|The year in 4-digit format.|1999, 1812| |MM|The numeric month.
trans-unit.target: | Formato de padrão | Descrição | Exemplos | |--------------------|-----------------|--------------| | aaaa | O ano no formato de 4 dígitos. | 1999, 1812 | | MM | O mês numérico.

trans-unit.source: Single-digit months have a leading zero.|11, 05| |zzz|The full time zone offset (hour and minutes) from the Universal Time Coordinate (Greenwich Mean Time).
trans-unit.target: Dígito meses têm um zero à esquerda. | 11, 05 | | zzz | O tempo inteiro desvio de fuso (hora e minutos) da hora Universal Coordenada (hora de Greenwich).

trans-unit.source: Single-digit hours have a leading zero.|-07:00, 08:00|
trans-unit.target: Horas de dígito tem um zero à esquerda. | -07: 00, 08:00 |

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> to convert
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>Converter</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A object that is obtained from value.
trans-unit.target: A objeto que é obtido a partir do value .

trans-unit.source: value does not contain a date and time that corresponds to any of the recognized format patterns.
trans-unit.target: valuenão contém uma data e hora que corresponde a nenhum dos padrões de formato reconhecido.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the date and time of the current instance is positive or negative.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define se a data e hora da instância atual está positivo ou negativo.

trans-unit.source: An integer of less than 0 indicates a negative Sign.
trans-unit.target: Um número inteiro de inferior a 0 indica um sinal negativo.

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates whether <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYearMonth.Value*> is positive or negative.
trans-unit.target: Um número inteiro que indica se <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYearMonth.Value*>é positivo ou negativo.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYearMonth.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYearMonth.Value*> as a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYearMonth.Value*>como <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYearMonth.Value*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that is obtained from <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYearMonth.Value*> in the format "yyyy-MM" or "'-'yyyy-MM" if <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYearMonth.Sign*> is negative.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que é obtida a partir <> </> *> no formato "aaaa-MM" ou "'-' aaaa-MM" se <> </> *> é negativo.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the date and time of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a data e hora da instância atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> object that contains the date and time of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DateTime>objeto que contém a data e hora da instância atual.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Gets the XML Schema definition language (XSD) of the current SOAP type.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a linguagem de definição de esquema XML (XSD) do tipo SOAP atual.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that indicates the XSD of the current SOAP type.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que indica o XSD do tipo SOAP atual.</xref:System.String>
